@musicmad441 wrote:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“resetserver”) && playerRights >= 2) {
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is reseting server!!!");
resetserver();

}[/code]

Thats what you want.

item.title: Few Errors
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

I got this error:

client.java:178: illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith("resetserver") && playerRights >= 2)
^
client.java:178: <identifier> expected
if (command.startsWith("resetserver") && playerRights >= 2)
                      ^
client.java:178: illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith("resetserver") && playerRights >= 2)
                       ^
3 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

When I added

if (command.startsWith("resetserver") && playerRights >= 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is reseting server!!!");
	resetserver();

}

Read full topic
